data.title: Football Club History Database
data.text:
HARTLEPOOL UNITED

1977 Hartlepool changed name 1990-91 Missed runner-up spot on goal difference Promoted to Division Three 1992-93 Division Three re-designated Division Two on formation of F.A. Premier League 1994 Relegated to Division Three 1999-00 Not promoted after play-offs (SF Hartlepool United 0 Darlington 2, Darlington 1 Hartlepool United 0 - Agg 0-3) 2000-01 Not promoted after play-offs (SF Blackpool 2 Hartlepool United 0, Hartlepool United 1 Blackpool 3 - Agg 1-5) 2001-02 Made play-offs on goal difference, but not promoted (SF Hartlepool United 1 Cheltenham Town 1, Cheltenham Town 1 Hartlepool United 1 - Agg 2-2 Cheltenham Town won 5-4 on penalties) 2002-03 Football League Division Three runner-up Promoted to Division Two 2003-04 Not promoted after play-offs (SF Hartlepool United 1 Bristol City 1, Bristol City 2 Hartlepool United 1 - Agg 2-3) 2004-05 Football League Division Two renamed "League One" Not promoted after playoffs (SF Hartlepool United 2 Tranmere Rovers 0, Tranmere Rovers 2 Hartlepool United 0 - Agg 2-2 Hartlepool United won 6-5 on penalties, F Hartlepool United 2 Sheffield Wednesday 4 @ Millennium Stadium, Cardiff) 2006 Relegated to League Two 2006-07 Football League Two runner-up Promoted to League One 2009-10 Three points deducted 2013 Relegated to League Two 2016-17 Football League renamed English Football League 2017 Relegated to National League 2019-20 Season ended early to due Covid-19 virus. League decided on a points per game basis 2020-21 Promoted to English Football League Two after play-offs (SF Stockport County 0 Hartlepool United 1, F Torquay United 1 Hartlepool United 1 @ Bristol City, Hartlepool United won 5-4 on penalties) 2023 Relegated to National League SEASON LEAGUE P W D L F A P POS 1977-78 FL-4 46 15 7 24 51 84 37 21/24 1978-79 FL-4 46 13 18 15 57 66 44 13/24 1979-80
